Mod.name: Lukki - Spiderwalk 1.3.4
Mod.description:
Perk: Lukki Mutation disables flying, and replaces it with fast spiderwalk.
By popular demand, I have added an option to re-enable the vanilla attacking limb. To enable it you must modify the out-of-game config file located here:
.../Steam/steamapps/workshop/content/881100/1984503415/files/config.lua
